title: Biotechnical Centre Naklo

author: Daša Toman Turuk, Biotechnical centre Naklo

segmentation: My name is Sasha Tomintoul can't.
I'm coming from Butte Technical center Nakhla.
I'm a lecturer at the vocational college.
Bill Technical Center knock Louise.
School, so our primary activities, education and training to qualify students.
I will start with our values.
Why becausw really believe that our values is the motor?
Of our motivation and work and also of our future.
So our values are driven by our interest in working with students, teachers, partners and individuals.
That have a positive social and environmental impact.
We develop intercultural relationships.
We promote our national heritage, develop cooperation and teamwork and exchange our experience.
Just briefly, the organization and our history, so be a technical center.
Nakhla has more than 100 universary.
It start with secondary school in 1926.
Today there is more than 800 students and one 110 associate's.
In 2007 we start with vocational College and start today with two programs, agriculture and landscape management and nature conservation.
This year, in October we will start with the third new one that is hard to culture, which will brings us additional 60 students so.
In the end of this year, we will have around 300 students.

And the third main business unit is Business Educational Center which includes adult education, formal and informal, then project off its and managing of school, a state or school farm which is included also our school shop where we are selling cover.
Equal or organic products.

We promoting landscape, landscape management and cooperation with enterprise sector.
So also our tradition is very important for us and that we are really high qualified, high quality education research and development institution.

Four different programs from 4 year Education program to two year.

Agriculture and landscape management.
Nature, conservation and horticulture which.
It is 2 years program and it is full time and part time course.
We are also proud of our practical education so each student students have stood to do 4 hours per year of practical, practical work.
So that means in our school forum or also outside.
Some some photos of our students on the field.
About the research group which we start in 2010, there will be much more talk about that research group on Friday meeting.

So Agra ecosystem diary Education Tourism Bureau Technology, medical plant.

A circle from the you see like this that students go around to all this area and that also our.
